purpose.description: The form collects user inputs and submits to story.html via GET, which aligns with the project goal of crafting a story from user-provided blanks.
The form appears to include all required fields and a submit button, enabling end-to-end submission for the story generation.

readability.description: Form structure is straightforward and labels accompany inputs for clarity.
Some minor typos and aria/accessibility considerations can improve readability, such as consistent spacing and descriptive label text.

performance.description: Form uses standard HTML inputs and does a single form submission as intended.
Ensure default values donâ€™t interfere with validation and consider removing placeholder example values from inputs to rely on user input (helps with real data submission).
